query: core_product_name: gas monitoring system | feature_or_specifications: controller: dual redundant (parallel/hot standby) wall mounted programmable logic controller (process plc), included: plc panels, input output modules, power supply units, relays with base, barriers, tbs(terminal blocks), dual ethernet ports per processor, serial interface modules, wirings, glands, plugs, other modules/hardware, spare requirements, licenses, tags, software, ai(analog input): 28 nos, di(digital input): 12 nos, do(digital output): 4 nos, serial interface ports: 4, additional 20% spare (min 1), panel: wall mounted, location: central monitoring hub (cmh), includes: all components, accessories, customization of reports
